headline: Costco Holds Steady While Walmart Bets Big on E-Commerce Transformation
summary: Costco Wholesale Corporation (NASDAQ: COST) and Walmart Inc. (NYSE: WMT) both closed out strong quarters recently, revealing two very different strategies for winning in retail. Costco leaned into its membership warehouse model with e-commerce expansion. Walmart went all-in on omnichannel transformation and marketplace growth. E-Commerce Growth Tells Two Different Stories Walmart’s digital business exploded 27% ... Costco Holds Steady While Walmart Bets Big on E-Commerce Transformation
